titleStmt.title: The priests ignorance; and contrary walkings to the scriptures: or The practice of the Apostles, who were the true ministers of Jesus Christ; together with thirty seven errours of the priests, discovered.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.
Aldam, Thomas, d. 1660.

notesStmt.note: P. 5 signed: Richard Farneworth, Tho. Aldham.
Misprinted in Thomason catalog as E.860[8].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
